name: Ojas Kanda
text: I couldn't stop thinking about it after it ended. I was left with chills down my spine.

name: Saira Sodhi
text: I was completely enchanted by the story. It's a movie I'll never forget.

name: Jayan Butala
text: The story was so gripping, I couldn't tear myself away. I loved every second of it. The movie was an emotional rollercoaster.

name: Trisha Dutt
text: An instant classic. The movie was a breath of fresh air. I couldn't tear my eyes away from the screen.

name: Drishya Bhatti
text: The movie was a revelation. I couldn't have asked for a better moviegoing experience. This movie exceeded all my expectations.
